dan api katha karana aarthika wruddhiyath samanga athiwuna nawa rakiya awastha sewa wiyukthi anupathaya aduwimata kelinma balapanawa.aadayam wardhanayadan api awurudu dekaka kalayaksiyayata 8 ka ewani ihala sanwardhanawegayaklanga karaganimata samathwa sitimu.ilakka anuwawasara 2015 dakwama ihala sanwardhanawegayak randawa ganima rajaye apekshawayi.rate pahala aadayam labana kotaswalata wadiwana sanwardhanaye prathilabha gala yamata salaswaminkolambaatath, kolambaa disthrikkayatathsima wi thibusanwardhanayepala prayojanaaatha gramiya pradesha dakwa da wyaptha wemin pawathina bawa sanwardhanayehilalaba athijayagrahanawalinpahadili weyi.eeka pudgala aadayame wardhanayath 2011 di athkaragatha haki wuna. 2010 di dolar 2400 sita 2011 di dolar 2836 dakwa pahadili wardhanayak pennum karanawa.
